title: Watson to start…Lamar looking for his contract
description:
Deshaun Watson is slated to start the first preseason game as he awaits a ruling from the NFL’s appeal. Jalen & Jacoby breakdown why the Cleveland Browns decided to make this move. Also, Lamar Jackson is still looking for his next big contract, but will he get it before the start of the season? Find out it if the guys think that Lamar needs that contract today. Plus, the guys breakdown the NFC East win totals for Vegas. Did they get the Cowboys record, correct? Or is there another team on Jalen’s radar that could win the division? Listen to find out which team it could be. And does KD want a reunion with James Harden in Philly? Jalen says noooo way. Find out why and much more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
